segment.source: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: The procedures in this section describe how to configure the virtual machine for first-time setup.
segment.target: The procedures in this section describe how to configure the virtual machine for first-time setup.

segment.source: The virtual machine setup configures the setup performed when the virtual machine is run on the client for the first time.
segment.target: The virtual machine setup configures the setup performed when the virtual machine is run on the client for the first time.

segment.source: The virtual machine setup is configured differently for persistent and revertible MED-V workspaces.
segment.target: The virtual machine setup is configured differently for persistent and revertible MED-V workspaces.

segment.source: For more information about persistent and revertible MED-V workspaces, see Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies.
segment.target: For more information about persistent and revertible MED-V workspaces, see Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies.

segment.source: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: Describes how to configure the virtual machine setup for persistent and revertible MED-V workspaces.
segment.target: Describes how to configure the virtual machine setup for persistent and revertible MED-V workspaces.
